Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileManager

  • public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The class FileManager is used to implement the communication between the database and the logic of the software. It mantains some useful information about the models present in the system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileManager(Database database) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getArraySize(FileType fileType)
      The aim of this method is to return the size of the ArrayList containing the models of fileType "fileType".
      java.util.ArrayList<Model> getClicked(FileType fileType)
      The aim of this method is to return an ArrayList containing all the models of the type indicated by "fileType" that have been clicked by the user.
      Model getElement(FileType fileType, int index)
      The aim of this method is to return the model of file type "fileType" at index "index".
      int getIdByName(java.lang.String name, FileType fileType)
      The aim of this method is to obtain the id of an element with name "name" and of file Type "fileType".
      java.util.Iterator<Model> getIterator(FileType fileType)
      The aim of this method is to return an iterator for the ArrayList corresponding to the FileType "fileType".
      java.util.ArrayList<Model> getModelArray(FileType fileType) 
      void insert(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String path, FileType fileType)
      The aim of this method is to wrap the Database method to insert a model named "name", located at path "path", of file type "fileType".
      void remove(java.lang.String name, FileType fileType)
      The aim of this method is to wrap the Database method to delete a model named "name" of file type "fileType".
      void setClicked(FileType fileType, int index, boolean val)
      The aim of this method is to modify the clicked state of the model of file type "fileType" to the boolean value "val"
      java.util.ArrayList<Model> updateModelData(FileType fileType)
      The aim of the following method is to extract the values from the table indicated by "fileType" and put them into the ArrayList which associated to the FileType "fileType".

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
